abstract: If the F.D.A. follows the advisory panel’s recommendation, Medtronic may be able to enter the lucrative American market for drug-coated stents by the end of this year.
snippet: If the F.D.A. follows the advisory panel’s recommendation, Medtronic may be able to enter the lucrative American market for drug-coated stents by the end of this year.
lead_paragraph: A federal advisory panel unanimously recommended today that regulators approve a new drug-coated heart stent, along with a requirement for follow-up safety studies.

headline.main: Advisory Panel Backs New Drug-Coated Stent
